AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where defendants were indicted for transporting undocumented aliens, and country of citizenship claimed by the driver
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Court: legal body presiding over the case involving defendants Ricardo Rodriguez, Jr. and Ignacio Rodriguez, Jr.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer Police Department: Employer of Officer Reymundo Reyes, involved in the traffic stop of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer, Texas: location of immigration checkpoint on U.S. 59
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 59: Intersection location with Highway 16, where the traffic stop occurred and location of Freer immigration checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint: location where Agent Montemayor arrived to investigate an attempted alien smuggling event
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Corpus: possible destination for vehicles inspected at the Freer immigration checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Houston: destination city for smuggled aliens, accessible via Highway 16
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: Road where Agent Trevino made observations of suspicious vehicles and location of the wind farm, characterized by limited traffic and mostly used by local residents and workers
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint building: building where border patrol agents process undocumented individuals
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Border Patrol station parking lot: parking area near the Freer immigration checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint office: office where border patrol agents inspect vehicles and process individuals
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Bruni: reference point for drop-offs of undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hebbronville: origin of Defendant's journey, location of a checkpoint on U.S. 359
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 16: Location where Officer Reymundo Reyes noticed the black truck and conducted a traffic stop, intersection with U.S. 59
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Corinth, Texas: location where the vehicle's plate is registered, somewhere north of San Antonio
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: location where Agent Montemayor received a phone call regarding an attempted alien smuggling event
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Dallas, Texas: destination of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s travel, mentioned in the context of the traffic stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hertz Dallas-Fort Worth: rental car company used by smugglers to obtain vehicles
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 35: alternative route to Dallas or San Antonio, potentially used by smugglers
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mills Bennett Road: dirt road intersecting FM 2050, approximately five miles south of the Freer immigration checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Pablo Road: location where Agent Trevino initiated a stop, south of the wind farm on FM 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Moglia ranch house: ranch house near the wind farm on FM 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Stag ranch trailer: ranch trailer near the wind farm on FM 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Santo Nino Road: road also known as Dinn Ranch, extending to the east off of FM 2050, providing vehicle access to Highway 16
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.wind farm on FM 2050: location of windmills and wind farm office, between twelve and fifteen miles from the Freer immigration checkpoint on U.S. 59, where Agent Trevino initiated a stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico: country of origin for illegal aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 16 and U.S. 59: Location of the intersection where the traffic stop took place
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Border Patrol station: location where IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. was held in a holding cell before being interviewed by Agent Montemayor
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: law enforcement agency involved in the case, conducting stops and interrogations
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexico border: International boundary where roving Border Patrol stops are conducted, proximity to which is a factor in determining reasonable suspicion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Fifth Circuit: judicial circuit with relevant case law regarding reasonable suspicion for Border Patrol stops
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Echo 43: checkpoint within fifty miles of the Mexico border
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050 area: rural area characterized by ranches and a wind farm, with limited traffic
